publications.title: Using MongoDB Sync to Replace Kinesis for Real-Time Fuel Data Update
publications.description: Explores MongoDB Sync as a low-latency alternative to AWS Kinesis for fuel data synchronization.

publications.title: Software-Driven Automated Leak Detection in Fuel Storage Tanks
publications.description: Presents a software solution using Redis and AWS Lambda for real-time fuel tank leak detection.

publications.title: Reducing Latency in Cloud-Based Fuel Monitoring Systems
publications.description: Introduces an integrated approach to reduce latency in cloud-based fuel monitoring using edge processing.

publications.title: Designing Software for Real-Time Pump Dispenser Data Streaming Using AWS Kinesis
publications.description: Describes the design of software for streaming real-time pump dispenser data using AWS Kinesis.

publications.title: Scalable Cloud Solutions for Multi-Station Fuel Data Aggregation
publications.description: Explores scalable cloud-based architectures using ECS and load balancers for fuel station data management.

publications.title: Developing a Microservices Architecture for Fuel Station Monitoring Systems Using AWS Lambda
publications.description: Presents a microservices architecture using AWS Lambda for fuel station monitoring.

publications.title: Creating Software for Real-Time Visualization of ATG Data
publications.description: Develops software for real-time ATG data visualization, improving monitoring and decision-making.

publications.title: SOFTWARE FOR REAL-TIME RECONCILIATION BETWEEN ATG AND PUMP DATA
publications.description: Introduces software for real-time reconciliation of ATG and pump data to enhance operational accuracy.

pressReleases.title: The Future of Fueling Systems
pressReleases.description: Free Press Journal highlights my role in advancing fuel system automation with cloud and IoT, enhancing security and efficiency.
